snippet: The British newcomer won four awards, including for song of the year and best new artist. Other big winners included Beck, Beyoncé, Pharrell Williams and Miranda Lambert.
lead_paragraph: The British newcomer won four awards, including for song of the year and best new artist. Other big winners included Beck, Beyoncé, Pharrell Williams and Miranda Lambert.

headline.main: Sam Smith Shines at the 2015 Grammy Awards
